config_files.abixen-platform-business-intelligence-se:
FROM openjdk:8-jre
VOLUME /tmp
ADD abixen-platform-business-intelligence-service.jar app.jar

ENTRYPOINT ["java","-Djava.security.egd=file:/dev/./urandom","-Dspring.profiles.active=docker","-Dabixen.services.eureka.uri=discovery"]
CMD ["-jar","/app.jar"]

static_files.abixen-platform-business-intelligence-se:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>

<databaseChangeLog
        xmlns="http://www.liquibase.org/xml/ns/dbchangelog"
        xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
        xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.liquibase.org/xml/ns/dbchangelog http://www.liquibase.org/xml/ns/dbchangelog/dbchangelog-4.6.xsd"
        logicalFilePath="liquibase/changelog/changelog.xml">

    <include file="liquibase/changelog/multi-visualisation/changelog.xml"/>
</databaseChangeLog>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>

<databaseChangeLog
        xmlns="http://www.liquibase.org/xml/ns/dbchangelog"
        xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
        xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.liquibase.org/xml/ns/dbchangelog http://www.liquibase.org/xml/ns/dbchangelog/dbchangelog-4.6.xsd"
        logicalFilePath="liquibase/changelog/multi-visualisation/changelog.xml">

    <include file="liquibase/changelog/multi-visualisation/multi-visualisation-sequences-changelog.xml"/>
    <include file="liquibase/changelog/multi-visualisation/data-source-changelog.xml"/>
    <include file="liquibase/changelog/multi-visualisation/data-set-changelog.xml"/>
    <include file="liquibase/changelog/multi-visualisation/data-set-series-changelog.xml"/>
    <include file="liquibase/changelog/multi-visualisation/database-connection-changelog.xml"/>
    <include file="liquibase/changelog/multi-visualisation/database-data-source-changelog.xml"/>
    <include file="liquibase/changelog/multi-visualisation/file-data-source-changelog.xml"/>
    <include file="liquibase/changelog/multi-visualisation/file-data-source-row-changelog.xml"/>
    <include file="liquibase/changelog/multi-visualisation/data-file-changelog.xml"/>
    <include file="liquibase/changelog/multi-visualisation/data-column-changelog.xml"/>
    <include file="liquibase/changelog/multi-visualisation/data-source-column-changelog.xml"/>
    <include file="liquibase/changelog/multi-visualisation/data-set-series-column-changelog.xml"/>
    <include file="liquibase/changelog/multi-visualisation/data-value-changelog.xml"/>
    <include file="liquibase/changelog/multi-visualisation/data-value-date-changelog.xml"/>
    <include file="liquibase/changelog/multi-visualisation/data-value-double-changelog.xml"/>
    <include file="liquibase/changelog/multi-visualisation/data-value-integer-changelog.xml"/>
    <include file="liquibase/changelog/multi-visualisation/data-value-string-changelog.xml"/>
    <include file="liquibase/changelog/multi-visualisation/chart-configuration-changelog.xml"/>

</databaseChangeLog>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>

<databaseChangeLog
        xmlns="http://www.liquibase.org/xml/ns/dbchangelog"
        xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
        xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.liquibase.org/xml/ns/dbchangelog http://www.liquibase.org/xml/ns/dbchangelog/dbchangelog-4.6.xsd"
        logicalFilePath="liquibase/changelog/multi-visualisation/chart-configuration-changelog.xml">

    <changeSet author="MariuszKumor" id="chart-configuration-v1">
        <createTable tableName="chart_configuration">
            <column name="id" type="bigint">
                <constraints nullable="false"/>
            </column>
            <column name="created_by_id" type="bigint"/>
            <column name="created_date" type="timestamp"/>
            <column name="last_modified_by_id" type="bigint"/>
            <column name="last_modified_date" type="timestamp"/>
            <column name="axis_x_name" type="varchar(255)">
                <constraints nullable="true"/>
            </column>
            <column name="axis_y_name" type="varchar(255)">
                <constraints nullable="true"/>
            </column>
            <column name="filter_" type="longvarchar"/>
            <column name="chart_type" type="varchar(255)">
                <constraints nullable="false"/>
            </column>
            <column name="module_id" type="bigint">
                <constraints nullable="false"/>
            </column>
            <column name="data_set_id" type="bigint">
                <constraints nullable="false"/>
            </column>
            <column name="data_source_id" type="bigint">
                <constraints nullable="false"/>
            </column>
        </createTable>

        <addPrimaryKey columnNames="id" constraintName="pk__chart_configuration__id" tableName="chart_configuration"/>

        <addUniqueConstraint columnNames="module_id" constraintName="u__chart_configuration__module_id"
                             tableName="chart_configuration"/>

        <createIndex indexName="idx__chart_configuration__data_source_id" tableName="chart_configuration">
            <column name="data_source_id"/>
        </createIndex>

        <createIndex indexName="idx__chart_configuration__data_set_id" tableName="chart_configuration">
            <column name="data_set_id"/>
        </createIndex>

        <addForeignKeyConstraint baseColumnNames="data_source_id" baseTableName="chart_configuration"
                                 constraintName="fk__data_source_id__chart_configuration__data_source"
                                 deferrable="false"
                                 initiallyDeferred="false" onDelete="RESTRICT" onUpdate="RESTRICT"
                                 referencedColumnNames="id" referencedTableName="data_source"/>

        <addForeignKeyConstraint baseColumnNames="data_set_id" baseTableName="chart_configuration"
                                 constraintName="fk__data_set_id__chart_configuration__data_set"
                                 deferrable="false"
                                 initiallyDeferred="false" onDelete="RESTRICT" onUpdate="RESTRICT"
                                 referencedColumnNames="id" referencedTableName="data_set"/>

    </changeSet>

</databaseChangeLog>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>

<databaseChangeLog
        xmlns="http://www.liquibase.org/xml/ns/dbchangelog"
        xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
        xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.liquibase.org/xml/ns/dbchangelog http://www.liquibase.org/xml/ns/dbchangelog/dbchangelog-4.6.xsd"
        logicalFilePath="liquibase/changelog/multi-visualisation/data-source-column-changelog.xml">

    <changeSet author="KonradWisniewski" id="data-column-v1">
        <createTable tableName="data_column">
            <column name="type" type="varchar(31)">
                <constraints nullable="false"/>
            </column>
            <column name="id" type="bigint">
                <constraints nullable="false"/>
            </column>
            <column name="name" type="varchar(300)">
                <constraints nullable="false"/>
            </column>
            <column name="position" type="integer">
                <constraints nullable="false"/>
            </column>
            <column name="data_value_type" type="varchar(15)">
                <constraints nullable="false"/>
            </column>
            <column name="data_file_id" type="bigint">
                <constraints nullable="true"/>
            </column>
        </createTable>

        <addPrimaryKey columnNames="id" constraintName="pk__data_column__id" tableName="data_column"/>

        <createIndex indexName="idx__data_column__data_file_id" tableName="data_column">
            <column name="data_file_id"/>
        </createIndex>

        <addForeignKeyConstraint baseColumnNames="data_file_id" baseTableName="data_column"
                                 constraintName="fk__data_file_id__data_column__data_file" deferrable="false"
                                 initiallyDeferred="false" onDelete="RESTRICT" onUpdate="RESTRICT"
                                 referencedColumnNames="id" referencedTableName="data_file"/>

    </changeSet>

</databaseChangeLog>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>

<databaseChangeLog
        xmlns="http://www.liquibase.org/xml/ns/dbchangelog"
        xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
        xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.liquibase.org/xml/ns/dbchangelog http://www.liquibase.org/xml/ns/dbchangelog/dbchangelog-4.6.xsd"

                <constraints nullable="true"/>
            </column>
            <column name="file_data_source_id" type="bigint">

            <column name="created_by_id" type="bigint"/>

            <column name="last_modified_by_id" type="bigint"/>
            <column name="last_modified_date" type="timestamp"/>
        </createTable>

        <addPrimaryKey columnNames="id" constraintName="pk__data_file__id" tableName="data_file"/>

        <createIndex indexName="idx__data_file__data_column_id" tableName="data_file">
            <column name="file_data_source_id"/>
        </createIndex>

        <addForeignKeyConstraint baseColumnNames="file_data_source_id" baseTableName="data_file"
                                 constraintName="fk__file_data_source_id__data_file__file_data_source"
                                 deferrable="false"
                                 initiallyDeferred="false" onDelete="RESTRICT" onUpdate="RESTRICT"
                                 referencedColumnNames="id" referencedTableName="file_data_source"/>

    </changeSet>

</databaseChangeLog>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>

        xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.liquibase.org/xml/ns/dbchangelog http://www.liquibase.org/xml/ns/dbchangelog/dbchangelog-4.6.xsd"
        logicalFilePath="liquibase/changelog/multi-visualisation/database-connection-changelog.xml">

    <changeSet author="MariuszKumor" id="database-connection-v1">
        <createTable tableName="database_connection">
            <column name="id" type="bigint">
                <constraints nullable="false"/>
            </column>
            <column name="created_by_id" type="bigint"/>
            <column name="created_date" type="timestamp"/>
            <column name="last_modified_by_id" type="bigint"/>
            <column name="last_modified_date" type="timestamp"/>
            <column name="database_host" type="varchar(255)">
                <constraints nullable="false"/>
            </column>
            <column name="database_name" type="varchar(255)">
                <constraints nullable="false"/>
            </column>
            <column name="database_port" type="integer">
                <constraints nullable="false"/>
            </column>
            <column name="database_type" type="varchar(255)">
                <constraints nullable="false"/>
            </column>
            <column name="description" type="varchar(1000)"/>
            <column name="name" type="varchar(40)">
                <constraints nullable="false"/>
            </column>
            <column name="password" type="varchar(40)"/>
            <column name="username" type="varchar(40)">
                <constraints nullable="false"/>
            </column>
        </createTable>

        <addPrimaryKey columnNames="id" constraintName="pk__database_connection__id" tableName="database_connection"/>

    </changeSet>

</databaseChangeLog>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>

<databaseChangeLog
        xmlns="http://www.liquibase.org/xml/ns/dbchangelog"
        xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
        xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.liquibase.org/xml/ns/dbchangelog http://www.liquibase.org/xml/ns/dbchangelog/dbchangelog-4.6.xsd"
        logicalFilePath="liquibase/changelog/multi-visualisation/database-data-source-changelog.xml">

    <changeSet author="MariuszKumor" id="database-data-source-v1">
        <createTable tableName="database_data_source">
            <column name="filter_" type="longvarchar"/>
            <column name="selected_table" type="varchar(255)"/>
            <column name="id" type="bigint">
                <constraints nullable="false"/>
            </column>
            <column name="database_connection_id" type="bigint">
                <constraints nullable="false"/>
            </column>
        </createTable>

        <addPrimaryKey columnNames="id" constraintName="pk__database_data_source__id" tableName="database_data_source"/>

        <createIndex indexName="idx__database_data_source__database_connection_id" tableName="database_data_source">
            <column name="database_connection_id"/>
        </createIndex>

        <addForeignKeyConstraint baseColumnNames="database_connection_id" baseTableName="database_data_source"
                                 constraintName="fk__database_connection_id__database_data_source__database_connection"
                                 deferrable="false"
                                 initiallyDeferred="false" onDelete="RESTRICT" onUpdate="RESTRICT"
                                 referencedColumnNames="id" referencedTableName="database_connection"/>

        <addForeignKeyConstraint baseColumnNames="id" baseTableName="database_data_source"
                                 constraintName="fk__id__database_data_source__data_source" deferrable="false"
                                 initiallyDeferred="false" onDelete="RESTRICT" onUpdate="RESTRICT"
                                 referencedColumnNames="id" referencedTableName="data_source"/>

    </changeSet>

</databaseChangeLog>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>

<databaseChangeLog
        xmlns="http://www.liquibase.org/xml/ns/dbchangelog"
        xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
        xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.liquibase.org/xml/ns/dbchangelog http://www.liquibase.org/xml/ns/dbchangelog/dbchangelog-4.6.xsd"
        logicalFilePath="liquibase/changelog/multi-visualisation/file-data-source-changelog.xml">

    <changeSet author="MariuszKumor" id="file-data-source-v1">
        <createTable tableName="file_data_source">
            <column name="id" type="bigint">
                <constraints nullable="false"/>
            </column>
            <column name="file_data_id" type="bigint">
                <constraints nullable="false"/>
            </column>
        </createTable>

        <addPrimaryKey columnNames="id" constraintName="pk__file_data_source__id" tableName="file_data_source"/>

        <addForeignKeyConstraint baseColumnNames="id" baseTableName="file_data_source"
                                 constraintName="fk__id__file_data_source__data_source" deferrable="false"
                                 initiallyDeferred="false" onDelete="RESTRICT" onUpdate="RESTRICT"
                                 referencedColumnNames="id" referencedTableName="data_source"/>

    </changeSet>

</databaseChangeLog>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>

<databaseChangeLog
        xmlns="http://www.liquibase.org/xml/ns/dbchangelog"
        xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
        xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.liquibase.org/xml/ns/dbchangelog http://www.liquibase.org/xml/ns/dbchangelog/dbchangelog-4.6.xsd"
        logicalFilePath="liquibase/changelog/multi-visualisation/data-source-column-changelog.xml">

    <changeSet author="KonradWisniewski" id="data-source-column-row-v1">
        <createTable tableName="file_data_source_row">
            <column name="id" type="bigint">
                <constraints nullable="false"/>
            </column>
            <column name="row_number" type="integer">
                <constraints nullable="false"/>
            </column>
            <column name="file_data_source_id" type="bigint">
                <constraints nullable="false"/>
            </column>
        </createTable>

        <addPrimaryKey columnNames="id" constraintName="pk__data_source_row__id" tableName="file_data_source_row"/>

        <createIndex indexName="idx__file_data_source_row__file_data_source_id" tableName="file_data_source_row">
            <column name="file_data_source_id"/>
        </createIndex>

        <addForeignKeyConstraint baseColumnNames="file_data_source_id" baseTableName="file_data_source_row"
                                 constraintName="fk__file_data_source_id__file_data_source_row__file_data_source" deferrable="false"
                                 initiallyDeferred="false" onDelete="RESTRICT" onUpdate="RESTRICT"
                                 referencedColumnNames="id" referencedTableName="file_data_source"/>

    </changeSet>

</databaseChangeLog>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>

<databaseChangeLog
        xmlns="http://www.liquibase.org/xml/ns/dbchangelog"
        xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
        xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.liquibase.org/xml/ns/dbchangelog http://www.liquibase.org/xml/ns/dbchangelog/dbchangelog-4.6.xsd"
        logicalFilePath="liquibase/changelog/multi-visualisation/multi-visualisation-sequences.xml">

    <changeSet id="multi-visualisation-sequences-v1" author="MariuszKumor">
        <createSequence sequenceName="chart_configuration_seq" startValue="13"/>
        <createSequence sequenceName="database_connection_seq" startValue="2"/>
        <createSequence sequenceName="data_set_seq" startValue="13"/>
        <createSequence sequenceName="data_set_series_column_seq" startValue="45"/>
        <createSequence sequenceName="data_set_series_seq" startValue="33"/>
        <createSequence sequenceName="data_source_column_seq" startValue="29"/>
        <createSequence sequenceName="data_source_column_file_seq" startValue="1"/>
        <createSequence sequenceName="data_source_seq" startValue="7"/>
        <createSequence sequenceName="data_source_row_seq" startValue="1"/>
        <createSequence sequenceName="data_column_seq" startValue="1"/>
        <createSequence sequenceName="data_file_seq" startValue="1"/>
        <createSequence sequenceName="data_value_seq" startValue="1"/>
    </changeSet>

</databaseChangeLog>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>

<databaseChangeLog
        xmlns="http://www.liquibase.org/xml/ns/dbchangelog"
        xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
        xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.liquibase.org/xml/ns/dbchangelog http://www.liquibase.org/xml/ns/dbchangelog/dbchangelog-4.6.xsd"
        logicalFilePath="liquibase/import/import.xml">

    <changeSet author="KonradWisniewski" id="import-v1" runAlways="false" runOnChange="true">

        <preConditions onFail="HALT">
            <sqlCheck expectedResult="0">SELECT COUNT(*) FROM database_connection</sqlCheck>
            <sqlCheck expectedResult="0">SELECT COUNT(*) FROM database_data_source</sqlCheck>
            <sqlCheck expectedResult="0">SELECT COUNT(*) FROM data_source</sqlCheck>
            <sqlCheck expectedResult="0">SELECT COUNT(*) FROM data_source_column</sqlCheck>
            <sqlCheck expectedResult="0">SELECT COUNT(*) FROM chart_configuration</sqlCheck>
            <sqlCheck expectedResult="0">SELECT COUNT(*) FROM data_set</sqlCheck>
            <sqlCheck expectedResult="0">SELECT COUNT(*) FROM data_set_series</sqlCheck>
            <sqlCheck expectedResult="0">SELECT COUNT(*) FROM data_set_series_column</sqlCheck>
        </preConditions>

        <loadData file="liquibase/import/data/database-connection.csv"
                  separator=";"
                  tableName="database_connection">
        </loadData>

        <loadData file="liquibase/import/data/data-source.csv"
                  separator=";"
                  tableName="data_source">
        </loadData>

        <loadData file="liquibase/import/data/database-data-source.csv"
                  separator=";"
                  tableName="database_data_source">
        </loadData>

        <loadData file="liquibase/import/data/data-source-column.csv"
                  separator=";"
                  tableName="data_source_column">
        </loadData>

        <loadData file="liquibase/import/data/data-set-series-column-data.csv"
                  separator=";"
                  tableName="data_set_series_column">
        </loadData>

        <loadData file="liquibase/import/data/data-set-data.csv"
                  separator=";"
                  tableName="data_set">
        </loadData>

        <loadData file="liquibase/import/data/chart-configuration-data.csv"
                  separator=";"
                  tableName="chart_configuration">
        </loadData>

        <loadData file="liquibase/import/data/data-set-series-data.csv"
                  separator=";"
                  tableName="data_set_series">
        </loadData>
    </changeSet>
</databaseChangeLog>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>

<databaseChangeLog
        xmlns="http://www.liquibase.org/xml/ns/dbchangelog"
        xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
        xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.liquibase.org/xml/ns/dbchangelog http://www.liquibase.org/xml/ns/dbchangelog/dbchangelog-4.6.xsd"
        logicalFilePath="liquibase/master-changelog.xml">

    <include file="liquibase/changelog/changelog.xml"/>
    <include file="liquibase/import/import.xml" />
</databaseChangeLog>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<Configuration status="info" name="XMLConfigTest" packages="org.apache.logging.log4j.test">
    <Properties>
        <Property name="pattern">%d{yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss SSS} [%p] [c=%c{1}] %m%n</Property>
    </Properties>

    <Appenders>
        <Console name="STDOUT">
            <PatternLayout>
                <pattern>${pattern}</pattern>
            </PatternLayout>
        </Console>
        <File name="File" fileName="abixen-platform-business-intelligence-service.log">
            <PatternLayout>
                <pattern>${pattern}</pattern>
            </PatternLayout>
        </File>
    </Appenders>

    <Loggers>
        <Logger name="com.abixen.platform.businessintelligence" level="debug" additivity="false">
            <AppenderRef ref="STDOUT"/>
        </Logger>

        <Logger name="org.hibernate" level="warn" additivity="false">
            <AppenderRef ref="File">
            </AppenderRef>
            <AppenderRef ref="STDOUT" level="warn"/>
        </Logger>

        <Logger name="org.springframework" level="warn" additivity="false">
            <AppenderRef ref="File">
            </AppenderRef>
            <AppenderRef ref="STDOUT" level="warn"/>
        </Logger>

        <Root level="info">
            <AppenderRef ref="STDOUT"/>
        </Root>
    </Loggers>

</Configuration>
